markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 336 2.0, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 108 2.0 **Tradition** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Ahriman](/Deities.aspx?ID=563), [Azathoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=567), [Bifrons](/Deities.aspx?ID=525), [Chamiaholom](/Deities.aspx?ID=593), [Dammar](/Deities.aspx?ID=536), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Gyronna](/Deities.aspx?ID=515), [Imot](/Deities.aspx?ID=671), [Lubaiko](/Deities.aspx?ID=678), [Mestama](/Deities.aspx?ID=519), [Sifkesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=437), [The Tides of Chaos](/Deities.aspx?ID=698), [Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=361) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Will **Duration** 1 round --- The target is struck with misfortune, which throws it off balance. The target must attempt a Will save. **Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
**Critical Failure** Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
name: Ill Omen
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=110" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 336 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Ahriman](/Deities.aspx?ID=563), [Azathoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=567), [Bifrons](/Deities.aspx?ID=525), [Chamiaholom](/Deities.aspx?ID=593), [Dammar](/Deities.aspx?ID=536), [Fortune's Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=378), [Gyronna](/Deities.aspx?ID=515), [Imot](/Deities.aspx?ID=671), [Lubaiko](/Deities.aspx?ID=678), [Mestama](/Deities.aspx?ID=519), [Sifkesh](/Deities.aspx?ID=437), [The Tides of Chaos](/Deities.aspx?ID=698), [Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=361)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** 1 round
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Curse a creature with misfortune.
</summary>
text: Ill Omen Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 336 2.0 , Gods & Magic pg. 108 2.0 Tradition Occult Deities Ahriman, Azathoth, Bifrons, Chamiaholom, Dammar, Fortune's Fate, Gyronna, Imot, Lubaiko, Mestama, Sifkesh, The Tides of Chaos, Zyphus Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration 1 round --- The target is struck with misfortune, which throws it off balance. The target must attempt a Will save. Success The target is unaffected. Failure The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result. Critical Failure Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.
